data.message: Happy Birthday Em,hope you bash Mariah Carey again.,Funny how she said,"Last man on earth still couldn't hit this." in obsessed but the truth is any guy with a dime sack of meth and a smile could hit that.Her twitter picture is in the shape of an H and that stands for Heather which is her birth name,sounds hella crazy right?She can take her fake teeth out and suck a dick.I may look like a druggie and sound crazy but at least i'm not paying for her twat like her new fiance is.Hope you didn't hit it within the last year and a half cause what people don't know is that the pictures and stories of her "sister"with prostitution and drug issues are actually her without make up.I better jump off this subject before I get sued but I sincerely hope you destroy the drunk hoe.Happy Birthday Em
